name: Text Defender
description:
The Empire has sent a fleet of robot drones to destroy you.

Your mission is to stay alive for as long as possible and destroy as many drones as you can.

• Easy touch interface
• Simple to play, difficult to master
• Play with your friends and beat their high-score

Why the name Text Defender?
Because the ships, drones, star-field and most of the game's graphics are made with text!
